title: Residence领地插件配置问题
author: qisi-jun
txt_content:
config文件里的
  CustomContainers: []
  CustomBothClick: []
  CustomRightClick: []
括号里要怎么填物品ID，求可用格式
【例如神秘时代6的世界盐】

服务端版本1.12.2 猫端 插件版本4.7.8.2

replies.author: ~宝藏男孩~

https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-631343-1-1.html因为我是手机发帖无法上传文件所以你可以参考这个帖子下面大 ...
没有啊！你发之前能自己先看看有没有吗？
不想自己翻就ctrl+F搜索关键字啊
NewPlayer:
    Use: false
    # Setting this to true, residence will be created for free
    # By setting to false, money will be taken from player, if he has them
    Free: true
    # Range from placed chest o both sides. By setting to 5, residence will be 5+5+1 = 11 blocks wide
    Range:
      X: 5
      Y: 5
      Z: 5
  # Experimental - The following settings are lists of block IDs to be used as part of the checks for the 'container' and 'use' flags when using mods.
  CustomContainers: 4469
  CustomBothClick: 4469
  CustomRightClick: 4469
  Visualizer:复制代码
刚好少这三排
